name: Deragon Eremine Remake
description:
Deragon Eremine Remake

Deragon Eremine Remake is a fan made game, based on a game of Philip Dyer, also known as a youtuber 3kliksphilip. 

Why remake?

While browsing youtube, i've stumbled upon a few interesting videos.  Movie scenes, with all sounds completely replaced with sounds from the game Deus Ex. Probably because it had the greatest death scream in videogames history.  Long story short, i was inspired enough to make a video of my own.  While i was thinking, youtube's autoplay started playing one of Philip's game development videos. And yes, in that video, he was talking about the development of Deragon Eremine, the original one. Clearly, it was inspired by Deus Ex, so i though, maybe i'll make a video, or mod the game with those sounds replaced, so i could record the video? But then, i discovered what the game itself was quite difficult. Recoring a video with successful run would prove to be problematic.

So instead, i chose to remake this game from scratch in a few days.
